visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend should be set.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins to ensure adequate spacing around the chart area. The title and axis labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The x-axis represents the months, and the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters. The data series includes monthly rainfall data for a year, with a custom color (#008080) applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart.
